m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model S & Model X Get 100 kWh Battery & Greater Range With P100D Option | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Tesla Model S & Model X Get 100 kWh Battery & Greater Range With P100D Option August 23rd, 2016 by Chris Boylan   They say nothing in life is certain but death and taxes. But you can add to that list: a bigger Tesla battery pack. Today Tesla officially announced a 100 kWh battery pack option for its Model S sedan and Model X SUV. When equipped with the “Ludicrous Speed” performance option (currently a requirement for the 100 kWh pack), a Tesla Model S P100D can now get from 0 to 60 MPH in just 2.5 seconds. That’s 0.3 seconds quicker than the previous model P90D
